Metadata.Title: 7.2.1 Protect All System Components Using Access Controls

Content.Data:
==Applies To==
* PCI DSS Requirement 7.2.1
==Policy Statement==
Use access controls on all system components.
==Policy Purpose==
Using access control systems to secure all system components helps prevent unauthorized access.
